original_title: Lanka Sathosa slashes prices of seven essential food items
original_body_lines: Lanka Sathosa has reduced the prices of six essential food items with effect from today (May 24).
Accordingly, the prices of LSL milk powder, Dried Chillies, Red lentils, Soya Meat, big onions and Sugar have been reduced.
LSL milk powder (400g) –  Rs. 1,030 per kg (reduced by Rs. 50)
